attributes.action: Dont ban the xl bully on scotland
attributes.additional_details:
The XL bully is 
Intelligent loyal and devoted canine companion
American Bullies are outgoing fun-loving confident dogs
They are gentle good-natured and very loving always eager to please
Thrives on lots of exercise and mental stimulation
Low maintenance on the grooming front
They are good watchdogs with some being more alert than others
They dont deserve to banned based on poor ownership and as with the uk we are fighting to end this ban as its ill thought and rushed
attributes.background: We dont need to ban the xl bully in scotland as scotland has its own way of dealing with breeds and bad owners.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about banning XL Bully dogs in Scotland are a matter for the Scottish Government and Parliament, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
